title: Luag
description: She accidentally brings a medieval Highlander home to modern times.Luag and Katherine are two bullheaded people trying to "out stubborn" each other. They've been verbally sparring in Medieval Scotland for the past year. He's never met a headstrong woman before, and he is such a stubborn male! It's a modern and reverse "Taming of the shrew," though. When chance throws them forward to Katherineâ€™s time, he is the fish out of water. Understanding blooms, as does love.There are 14 other books in the series!
